div.div: Structure estimates of K groups for Leptodactylodon bicolor using sampling location information.
div.p: Graph (A) and bar plot (C) show K = 8 based on the Ln( K) estimation. (B) and (D) represent respectively the graph and plot of the best K following Evanno’s approach Δ K = 5. Each vertical bar represents an individual for which is shown the proportional genetic assignment.
